case'hr-overview':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HrOverview,{});case'interview-management':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InterviewManagement,{});case'letter-templates':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LetterTemplates,{});case'hr-manage':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HrManage,{});case'employee-details':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EmployeeDetails,{});case'attendance-summary':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AttendanceSummary,{});case'holiday-calendar':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HolidayCalendar,{});case'incentives':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Incentives,{});// Finance Management
